hero.title: Precision Engineering for
hero.subtitle: OEM supplier for shock absorbers and suspension components. Trusted by industry leaders like Tenneco and Hitachi.

products.title: Precision Engineering
products.subtitle: High-performance components designed for durability and efficiency across all applications.

items.name: Piston
items.description: Precision-machined piston with ring grooves for optimal sealing in hydraulic cylinders and shock absorbers.

items.name: Rod Guide
items.description: Guiding component that ensures proper piston rod alignment and provides sealing interface in hydraulic systems.

items.name: Cylinder End (Base Valve)
items.description: Multi-port valve assembly for precise fluid flow control and pressure regulation in hydraulic applications.

items.name: Support Washer
items.description: Precision support disc with radial slots providing structural backing and load distribution in valve assemblies.

quality.desc: Our manufacturing process adheres to the strictest automotive standards.

quality.lab_text: Spectrometers, CMM, and fatigue testing equipment ensure material integrity.
quality.precision_text: Automated CNC machining with tolerances as tight as Â±0.005mm.

history.title: Our Legacy
history.subtitle: Ningbo Junma New Material Technology Co., Ltd., founded in 1990, is a member of the Powder Metallurgy Branch of the China General Machine Components Industry Association. Spanning 18,000 square meters with a total investment of over $20 million USD, we specialize in manufacturing powder metallurgy (PM) mechanical parts for automobiles, motorcycles, power tools, and home appliances. Over 40% of our products are exported to Europe, Asia, and the Americas, supported by a workforce of over 300 employees.
